"Ran": "When you head to Mount Magnus, I thought I'd give you some battle advice."
"All ARKS members measure their abilities using a value known as \"Power Level\"."
"It is a way to measure and quantify your physical ability, your armor, and your currently equipped weapon."
"Keep in mind that it is not a measurement of one's skill, and is therefore only a brief approximation."
"As Halpha can be a very dangerous place, Power Level is mainly a rubric to prevent ARKS from venturing into areas they aren't equipped for."
"The approximate Power Level for the area will be displayed, so please refer to that value as you prepare for your battle."
"We will be monitoring you very closely, as we wish you the best of luck."
"Welcome to Central City! It's a pleasure to meet you."
"I have the privilege of supporting you as one of the City's Operators."
"IF there's anything I can do for you as an Operator, simply say the word."
"I want to make things as easy as I can for everyone."
